com.codemelon.graph.vertex

Class UndirectedKruskalVertex<E extends SpanningTreeEdgeData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.AbstractVertex
      • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.DirectedEdgeDataVertex<T>
        • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.UndirectedEdgeDataVertex<E>
          • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.UndirectedKruskalVertex<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EdgeColorVertex<E>, EdgeDataVertex<E>, EdgeWeightVertex<E>, KruskalVertex<E>, Vertex
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UndirectedPrimVertex

    public class UndirectedKruskalVertex<E extends SpanningTreeEdgeData>
extends UndirectedEdgeDataVertex<E>
implements KruskalVertex<E>
    Undirected vertex supporting the functions necessary for Kruskal's algorithm. This vertex supports edge color and edge weight.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UndirectedKruskalVertex(EdgeDataFactory<E> edgeDataFactory)
      Construct vertex from a factory for building appropriate EdgeData objects.
